targets.query:
SELECT last("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/pv_voltage_2/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/load_percentage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/load_percentage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/pv_voltage_2/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "SOC" 
FROM "state"
WHERE "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/battery_1/state_of_charge/state'
  AND $timeFilter

SELECT last("value") AS "LoadPower" 
FROM "state"
WHERE "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/load_power/state'
  AND $timeFilter

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/battery_1/cycles/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/battery_1/cell_voltage_-_lowest/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/battery_1/cell_voltage_-_highest/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Load Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/load_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Grid Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/grid_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "PV Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/pv_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "PV Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d+\/pv_power\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/load_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/load_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Total" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/load_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Grid Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/grid_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/pv_voltage_1/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
   
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/pv_voltage_1/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/pv_power_2/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/pv_power_2/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/pv_voltage_2/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/pv_voltage_2/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

targets.query:
SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/pv_power_1/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/pv_power_1/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/pv_current_1/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/pv_current_1/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/pv_current_2/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/pv_current_2/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "value"
        FROM "state"
        WHERE "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/temperature/state'
        ORDER BY time DESC
        LIMIT 1

SELECT last("value") AS "value"
        FROM "state"
        WHERE "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/temperature/state'
        ORDER BY time DESC
        LIMIT 1

SELECT last("value") AS "Total" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/battery_current/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/battery_current/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/battery_current/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/grid_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/grid_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/grid_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/grid_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/ac_output_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/ac_output_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Total" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/ac_output_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/load_power_essential/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/load_power_essential/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/load_power_non-essential/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/load_power_non-essential/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Total" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/total/load_power_non-essential/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/generator_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/generator_power/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Load Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /^solar_assistant_DEYE\/inverter_\d\/auxiliary_pv_power\/state$/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT last("value") AS "value"
        FROM "state"
        WHERE "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/battery_1/temperature/state'
        ORDER BY time DESC
        LIMIT 1

SELECT last("value") AS "value"
        FROM "state"
        WHERE "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/battery_1/temperature_mos/state'
        ORDER BY time DESC
        LIMIT 1

SELECT last("value") AS "value"
        FROM "state"
        WHERE "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/battery_1/temperature_mos/state'
        ORDER BY time DESC
        LIMIT 1

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Load Power" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/battery_\d+\/temperature\/state/ ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 1" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_1/battery_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Inverter 2" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" = 'solar_assistant_DEYE/inverter_2/battery_voltage/state' GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT MEAN("value") AS "Battery state of charge" FROM "state"
WHERE $timeFilter
AND "topic" =~ /solar_assistant_DEYE\/battery_\d+\/state_of_charge\/state/ GROUP BY time($__interval), "topic" fill(null)

list.definition: select rp from forever.rp_config where time >= now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1
list.label: Retention Policy
list.name: rp
list.query: select rp from forever.rp_config where time >= now() - ${__from}ms order by time asc limit 1
